Sentencas: Nanocrystalline thin film membranes of terbium (Tb)-doped strontium cerate (SrCeO3) which is of interest in the hydrogen (H-2) separation and solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), was synthesized via polymer precursor technique.
Titulo: Microstructural analysis of doped-strontium cerate thin film membranes fabricated via polymer precursor technique

Sentencas: Continuous and dense thin film membranes of composition SrCe0.95Tb0.O-05(3-delta) were prepared using spin-coating technique by utilizing ethylene glycol (EG)-based polymeric precursor.
Titulo: Microstructural analysis of doped-strontium cerate thin film membranes fabricated via polymer precursor technique

Sentencas: The polymeric precursor was deposited on silicon-based substrates, and converted to dense polycrystalline thin film ceramic membranes by sintering at relatively low temperatures.
Titulo: Microstructural analysis of doped-strontium cerate thin film membranes fabricated via polymer precursor technique

Sentencas: The number of spin-coating cycles and sintering temperatures were systematically varied to study their effect on the film morphology, thickness, and crystallite size within the membranes.
Titulo: Microstructural analysis of doped-strontium cerate thin film membranes fabricated via polymer precursor technique

Sentencas: Fourier transform infrared (FTIR) spectroscopy was utilized to study the changes in the polymer chemistry during the membrane processing.
Titulo: Microstructural analysis of doped-strontium cerate thin film membranes fabricated via polymer precursor technique

Sentencas: Thermogravimetric analysis (TGA) and differential thermal analysis (DTA) were used to examine thermal decomposition and thermodynamics of the synthesized precursor, respectively.
Titulo: Microstructural analysis of doped-strontium cerate thin film membranes fabricated via polymer precursor technique

Sentencas: The scanning electron microscopy (SEM) analysis was used to study the surface morphology and estimate average particle size as a function of number of spin-coating cycles and sintering temperatures.
Titulo: Microstructural analysis of doped-strontium cerate thin film membranes fabricated via polymer precursor technique

Sentencas: Atomic force microscope (AFM) was utilized to determine the roughness and quality of the spin-coated films.
Titulo: Microstructural analysis of doped-strontium cerate thin film membranes fabricated via polymer precursor technique

Sentencas: The membrane thickness, crystal structure, and nanocrystallite size were determined using focused ion-beam (FIB) milling and X-ray diffraction (XRD) techniques.
Titulo: Microstructural analysis of doped-strontium cerate thin film membranes fabricated via polymer precursor technique

Sentencas: Furthermore, the surface chemistry of the thin film membranes was studied by means of X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy (XPS).
Titulo: Microstructural analysis of doped-strontium cerate thin film membranes fabricated via polymer precursor technique

Sentencas: This study demonstrated that by using the EG-based polymeric precursor, dense and continuous Tb-doped SrCeO3 thin film membranes, having thicknesses in the range of 0.2-2 mu m and average nanocrystal lite size of 8-70 nm, can be effectively synthesized by controlling the number of spin-coating cycles and sintering temperature.
Titulo: Microstructural analysis of doped-strontium cerate thin film membranes fabricated via polymer precursor technique
Microstructural analysis of doped-strontium cerate thin film membranes fabricated via polymer precursor technique
